data.title: Easterseals MORC
data.meta_description: With multiple locations across Michigan, we are here to serve you.
data.text:
Easterseals is leading the way to full equity, inclusion, and access by enriching education, enhancing health, expanding employment, and elevating community.

We do this through life-changing Programs and on-the-ground supports for children and adults with disabilities, families, and local communities.

Through a variety of resources, Easterseals provides information and guidance about how to navigate changing needs within our communities.

Visit Support & Education to receive support for a variety of topics that may be important to you.

Join us in helping to increase opportunities for people with disabilities, families, and communities nationwide.

Visit Get Involved for more ways you can be a part of our mission.

Easterseals is leading the way to full equity, inclusion, and access through life-changing disability and community services.

Visit About Us to learn more about Easterseals.
